title: blue essence deducted
body:
i had around 2.4k blue essence, got a capsule for hitting level 42, malzahar shard was in the capsule, disenchanted the malzahar shard and instead of crediting me with the 900+ blue essence it deducted it from me, why? 

its your blue essence im not trying to influence what you do with it i just, wonder why. 

thanks

replies.body: Open a support ticket. They will be able to help you. {{summoner:4}}
cant submit a ticket because the page is not supported by my region (oce)

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Are you sure you're on the right page? The support site is supported by language not by region, so there shouldn't be any issues.

https://imgur.com/a/hyKdo

1. page does not support region
2. im logged in
3. english (us)
4. says im not logged in

idk whats going on lol

You have to login to the support site separately. Just press Login then follow the prompts and it should let you submit a ticket.

It says region isn't supported because technically it's an NA page and you're logged in (on boards) with an OCE account, but it still functions as normal for OCE.
